PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Projeto New Professor Grant - JCU "Finding Clusters and Outliers in Big Data" (#2255.00734.0102)
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: This project aims to investigate advanced techniques for exploratory analysis of big data, particularly in the realm of clustering and outlier detection, which can be used to extract hidden patterns and unveil useful knowledge from such data. This project expects to overcome limitations of existing methods and advance the state-of-the-art in this field. Expected outcomes include a new generation of algorithms and methods that could be beneficial to both researchers and practitioners, having the potential to help better data-driven decision making in a wide spectrum of application areas, with positive impact on society, environment, economy, and the quality of life.
